title: BRIEF-OSE Immunotherapeutics Presents Positive OSE-172 Human Ex-Vivo And Preclinical Study Results
text: March 19, 2018 / 5:19 PM / in 27 minutes BRIEF-OSE Immunotherapeutics Presents Positive OSE-172 Human Ex-Vivo And Preclinical Study Results Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - OSE IMMUNOTHERAPEUTICS SA: * TO PRESENT NEW DATA ON OSE-172 AT AMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR CANCER RESEARCH ANNUAL MEETING * ‍OSE-172, SIRPA ANTAGONIST, PREVENTS METASTASIS SPREAD IN AGGRESSIVE CANCER MODELS​ * OSE-172 ‍DECREASES TUMOR GROWTH AND SUPPRESSIVE FUNCTION OF TUMOR MYELOID CELLS * ‍OSE-172 POTENTIATES DENDRITIC CELL TUMOR ANTIGEN CROSS-PRESENTATION INCREASING T-CELL SPECIFIC ACTIVATION​ * ‍DATA BEING PRESENTED ON OSE-172 INCLUDE RESULTS FROM HUMAN EX-VIVO AND PRECLINICAL STUDIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
